document.name: options
document.title: &liberator.appname; 选项
document.p: &liberator.appname; 有许多内置的变量和开关，可用于达到某些特殊效果。这些选项有5种形式：

将 value 值增加给数值式选项值，又或者将其追加给字符式选项值。如果选项值是一个逗号分隔的列表，则会添加一个逗号，除非 value 是空的。如果选项值是 flags 列表，则多余的 flags 被移除。如果增加的 flag 值在原先的值里已有，则选项值不变。
将 value 值乘以数值式选项的值，如果是字符式选项，则将 value 置入选项值前。当选项是一个逗号分隔的列表时，除非 value 值为空，否则增补一个逗号。
从数值式选项的值中减去 value值，如果字符式选项值中含有 value，则将其移除。如果字符式选项中没有 value 值，不显示错误或警告。如果选项是一个逗号分隔的列表，则删减一个逗号，除非该选项值变成空的。当选项值是一个 flags 列表时，value 必须与它们在选项值中呈现的完全一致。为防止出现问题，可以一个个移除 flags。
作用与 :set 命令相同，不过操作仅作用于当前标签页的选项。更多细节请看 :set 命令。
与 :set 命令相同，但仅作用于全局选项。更多细节查看 :set。

document.p: 在路径选项如 cdpath 和 runtimepath 中环境变量会被展开。其变量符号是 $VAR(由非单词字符限定) 或 $VAR。%VAR% 在 Windows 平台同样支持。
&liberator.host; 首选项可以通过下列命令查看、设置：

description.p: 打开 &liberator.host; 首选项对话框。你可以从该对话框中更改浏览器首选项。请注意，不是所有的 &liberator.host; 首选项都会生效，因为 &liberator.appname; 覆盖了某些键绑定，并且更改 &liberator.host; 的 GUI。
在当前标签页中打开 about:config，这里你可以修改更高级的 &liberator.host; 选项。
更改任何 &liberator.host; 首选项(这些在 about:config 窗口中的)。你也可以通过 :set! preference& 命令来重置/删除这些首选项。

document.p: &liberator.appname; 在启动时设置了一些 &liberator.host; 首选项。如果这并非必要，则可以通过在 RC 配置文件中使用 :set! preference=value 来修改成其他的值。

description.p: 定义哪些标签页将被自动激活。可选项目如下：

description.warning: 在旧硬件上开启这个选项可能会延迟，所以，如果你不想经历不必要的延迟的话，就关闭本选项。

description.p: 当执行 :cd 命令时所搜寻的目录列表。只有当使用相对路径时本选项才会用到，如果指定的是绝对路径，则忽略选项。

dl.dd: 搜索引擎和关键词 URLs

description.p: 顺序是重要的，:set complete=bs 将首先列出书签，然后是所有已有的快速搜索项 。
description.warning: 条目很多的情况下，使用 b 和 h 会让补齐变得很慢。

item.default: Your default search engine keyword or "google"

description.p: 设置默认搜索引擎。在命令 :open [arg] 中，如果 [arg] 即不像 URL 也不像某特定的搜索引擎/关键字，则默认搜索引擎的名字被调用。
这意味着，如果你把 defsearch 设置为 youtube，则 :open arnold schwarzenegger 的结果与 :open youtube arnold schwarzennegger 是一样的。只不过，在那之前你需要先增加一个关键字或搜索引擎 youtube。
如果 defsearch 为空，则 &liberator.host; 将试图打开原始参数。
设置外部编辑器。 设置在插入模式及文本域模式中按 所调用的外部编辑器。
description.warning: 如果编辑器分支出自有的进程，比如 gvim，则不加 -f 参数的话 &liberator.appname; 的行为将不正常。

description.p: 允许从当前目录读取 RC 文件。该文件是在你的默认 RC 文件后导入的，并作为一个附加。

应该忽略的自动命令事件名称列表。如果列表中包含值 all 则所有的事件均被忽略。
更改当前 buffer 的字符编码。仅对当前页有效。

Focus the content after a page has loaded. This is useful if you always want to stay in Normal mode when browsing between web sites. When on, it blurs any textbox which often is automatically focused on page load. If you usually like focuscontent but sometimes you'd like to focus the first input field, you can use gi to jump to it. 在页面加载之后聚焦于内容。在浏览多个网站时，你如果想一直处于正常模式，这就很有用了。当选项值为 on 时，它会模糊任何文本框，而一般情况下，页面加载完后会自动聚焦于文本框的。如果你通常喜欢 focuscontent 但有时想聚焦于第一个输入域，则可以通过 gi 跳到它的框中。
description.note: 有一些网页使用 JavaScript 聚焦文本框，则 'focuscontent' 可能就没能如预料的那样起作用了。

The value of an explicit label for the input, this will not match most manually added labels that are found on sites.
The name of the input will be used, although the name is not designed for user consumption, it is frequently very similar to the label.

description.p: Change the hint matching algorithm during Hints mode.
Possible values:

dl.dd: The typed characters are split on whitespace, and these character groups have to match anywhere inside the text of the link.

The typed characters are matched with the beginning of the first word (see wordseparators) in the link as long as possible. If no matches occur in the current word, then the matching is continued at the beginning of the next word. The words are worked through in the order they appear in the link. If the typed characters contain spaces, then the characters are split on whitespace. These character groups are then matched with the beginning of the words, beginning at the first one and continuing with the following words in the order they appear in the link.
Behaves like wordstartswith, but non-matching words aren't overleaped.

item.description:
显示或隐藏 &liberator.host; 的 GUI 元素，比如菜单栏，工具栏或标签栏。Show or hide &liberator.host;'s GUI elements like the menu bar, toolbars or the tab bar. Since everything in Firefox is basically a toolbar, the toolbars and gui aliases are equivalent and can be used interchangeably. :set gui=none,tabs might read better for some, whereas :set toolbars=nonavigation might be better in other cases. 因为 Firefox 中几乎一切都可以认为是工具栏，所以，toolbars 和 gui 别名作用相当，可能换用。:set gui=none,tabs 在某些情况中可能更易阅读，而:set toolbars=nonavigation 在另外一些情况下却更佳。
This option is designed to allow full UI customization with Firefox's capabilities, as well as with Vimperator's. Therefore the default value :set gui= just means that we don't touch any GUI elements by default. If you want a truely minimal GUI, you can - however - just use :set gui=none in your .vimperatorrc file.
Individual elements can be shown with :set toolbars=<toolbar> and hidden with :set toolbars=no<toolbar>. If you want to toggle the display of an element, just use :set toolbars=inv<toolbar>, which also provides a good basis for adding some mappings to quickly toggle certain elements.
支持的元素：Supported elements:
menu 菜单栏 tabs 标签栏 Due to a bug, currently gets shown again by Firefox navigation Main toolbar which contains buttons for navigating back/forward as well as the location box. bookmarks 书签栏 addons 底部可选的附加组件栏。默认情况下，只在扩展组件用到它时才显示。
In order to quickly change the whole GUI, &liberator.appname; provides two more meta elements:
all 尽可能多地显示 GUI none 隐藏所有 GUI
Since the elements are processed sequentially, you can combine these items to change the whole GUI really quickly. E.g. to just show the tab bar, but no other GUI elements, use :set gui=none,tabs. 因为元素是按顺序处理的，于是你可以将它们合并，用于快速地改变整个 GUI。比如，仅显示标签栏，使用 :set gui=none,tabs。

description.p: 当前网站以最简的样式表显示，使得它更易于访问。Show current website with a minimal style sheet to make it easily accessible.
description.note: 目前这还是个局部选项，未来可能会支持全局值。This is a local option for now, a global value may be supported in the future.

description.p: Set the separator regex used to separate multiple URL args. Multiple arguments can be specified for :open, and similar commands, using this regex as the separator. Using whitespace alone is not generally useful since it is often contained in a single argument. E.g., :open linus torvalds should perform a single search for the key words linus and torvalds. If this is set to the empty string then these arguments will never be split.
If regex special character is used as url separator, it has to be escaped. For instance, | should be escaped as \\|.

Define which info messages are displayed. When bigger than zero, &liberator.appname; will give messages about what it is doing. These can be viewed at any time with the :messages command. The highest value is 15, being the most verbose mode.
Use visual bell instead of beeping on errors. The visual bell style is controlled by :hi Bell.
To disable both the audible and visual bells use :set visualbell and :hi Bell display: none;

Defines how command-line completion works. It is a comma-separated list of parts, where each part specifies what to do for each consecutive use of the completion key. The first part specifies the behavior for the first use of the completion key, the second part for the second use, etc.
These are the possible values for each part:

dl.dd: Complete the next full match. After the last, the original string is used.
Complete till the longest common string.
When more than one match, list all matches.
When more than one match, list all matches and complete the first match.
When more than one match, list all matches and complete till the longest common string. When there is only a single match, it is fully completed regardless of the case.

description.p: A regex which defines the word separators which are used for the hintmatching types wordstartswith and "firstletters" to split the words in the text of a link.
